topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5344d4426368722e4c700300#post_5344d4426368722e4c700300
Yes.

Think about it, anger is one of the few areas in western society where it is acceptable to show passion. Try advertising it in any other form and see how long it takes for people to mock you.
